description.value: A monitor that allows for the retrieval of the netto results from the purepath time minus the client wait time generated in the fat client as well as separations of response time into different block

property.label: Dynatrace Server
property.description: The dynatrace server to test plugin in

property.label: Username
property.description: The dynatrace username. This is necessary in order to access the server's RESTful interface

property.label: Password
property.description: The password of the corresponding username. Necessary in order to access the Dynatrace RESTful interface

property.label: Dashboard Name
property.description: The name of the dashboard to retrieve the XML

property.label: Minuend Measure
property.description: The measure from which another is to be subtracted

property.label: Subtrahend Measure
property.description: The measure to be subtracted from another

metric.name: netDiff
metric.description: The net difference between the purepath time minus the user wait time in the Baloise wait time

metric.name: Less_Than_One_Second
metric.description: The number of transactions that fall inside a certain response time block. This response time is the purepath time - user wait time divided the purepath count
